comments.author: Leslie
comments.content: Thanks for the artichoke tips...as a relatively-newer cook I'd been a bit exhausted at the idea of trying to figure out how to prep them but your steps seem completely manageable!  I think I might actually give this a try...

comments.author: paris221966
comments.content:
This looks SO good!  Pecorino romano is my favourite cheese for pasta.

Thanks for posting the recipe.  I'll try it.  I'll visit The Pink Door soon too

:-)

comments.author: Adam
comments.content: Beautiful! Thanks for the recipe, Michael.

comments.author: Denise
comments.content: This this great! I will have to try this.

comments.author: karen
comments.content: could you also use jarred artichokes, if you are in a hurry.?

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: For sure. It will be a pretty different dish since the fresh artichokes are kind of the star here, but I'm sure good in its own way!
